docs.snippet: The extent to which Government orders for wool goods will affect supply and prices in the coming months came in for considerable discussion in the trade last week. It appears to be the one factor, wool textile men said, which might disturb an...
docs.lead_paragraph: The extent to which Government orders for wool goods will affect supply and prices in the coming months came in for considerable discussion in the trade last week. It appears to be the one factor, wool textile men said, which might disturb an otherwise stable outlook in the woolen and worsted picture.
docs.abstract: Govt uniform orders effect on supply and prices discussed

headline.main: ARMY WOOL NEEDS MAY AFFECT PRICE; Government Uniform Orders Seen as Disturbing Factor on Textile Market Here

docs.snippet: SIR ALEXANDER MAXWELL, chairman of the British Tourist and Holiday Board, arrived in New York a few days ago looking not the least bit austere about England's tourist industry. This has been an excellent year so far, and next year should be better,...
docs.lead_paragraph: SIR ALEXANDER MAXWELL, chairman of the British Tourist and Holiday Board, arrived in New York a few days ago looking not the least bit austere about England's tourist industry. This has been an excellent year so far, and next year should be better, with more shipping and with the summer Olympic games to be held in London.
docs.abstract: NEW ZEALAND: Pan Pacific Good Neighbor Tours offering

headline.main: THE FIELD OF TRAVEL; British Holiday Board Chairman Extends Welcome to American Tourists

docs.snippet: LAKES SUCCESS, N.Y., Oct. 19 -- Delegates from the Arab states said today that, despite the United States and Soviet endorsement of the partition of Palestine, they had received enough definite pledges to block such a decision by the United Nations...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKES SUCCESS, N.Y., Oct. 19 -- Delegates from the Arab states said today that, despite the United States and Soviet endorsement of the partition of Palestine, they had received enough definite pledges to block such a decision by the United Nations General Assembly.
docs.abstract: Arab UN delegates claim enough votes to block partition; US inaction in getting backing for partition discussed; stands of various nations revd; Arab and Zionist views on USSR stand discussed; Syria reptd to hold 5 Haganah scouts; releases 3 Brit soldiers who entered Syria

headline.main: ARABS CLAIM VOTES TO BLOCK PARTITION; Say They Have Enough Pledges to Check U.N. Palestine Plan -- Disputed by Zionists Arabs Claim U.N. Votes to Block Plan for the Partition of Palestine

docs.snippet: Overriding last-ditch Soviet opposition, the United Nations General Assembly approved yesterday at Flushing Meadow a United States resolution to set up a permanent Balkan committee, with headquarters at Salonika, to aid in bringing about a settlement...
docs.lead_paragraph: Overriding last-ditch Soviet opposition, the United Nations General Assembly approved yesterday at Flushing Meadow a United States resolution to set up a permanent Balkan committee, with headquarters at Salonika, to aid in bringing about a settlement of disputes between Greece, on the one hand, and Yugoslavia, Albania and Bulgaria, on the other.
docs.abstract: Formation as permanent border com approved by Assembly
